name: Abdullah
review: Yamaha offers a wide range of motorcycles that are well-built, high-performance.

name: Abdur Rahman
review: Yamaha motorcycles are considered such good bikes that they ranked the highest in a Consumer Reports.

name: Abdur Rahim
review: Due to their less advanced technology, Yamaha motorcycles are usually more affordable and easier to maintain.

name: Ibrahim
review: Easy to Ride, Comfortable and Fun.

name: Omar
review: If you are looking for a motorcycle that's fun to ride, you should consider Yamaha.

name: Hasan
review: Nice motorcycle but little bit overpriced.
